short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Additional functionality for consumers of Badgr-based open badges.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds a "Claim Button" to an open-badge Badgr page to claim it by sending evidence associated with your email address.

You can paste any evidence (like a video link or a remote repository) at the claim modal that proves you have earned this badge or mastered the criteria/competencies.

By installing this extension, you agree to the CodeX Academy Policies at https://www.codex.academy/#/policy/privacy

UPDATE (v. 12.0.2): Send badge claiming and tooltip improved.

Enjoy it!
